text: Christophe Martin (born 21 February 1975 in Tournai) is a Belgian football goalkeeper who currently plays for R.F.C. Tournai. He started Mouscron's first four league matches of the 2006–07 season, but was back on the bench after their 3–1 defeat to K.S.K. Beveren on 26 August 2006. ==Honours== With Mouscron: *Belgian Cup runners-up (2005–06) ==External links== *Stats.com profile Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tournai Category:Belgian footballers Category:Eredivisie players Category:Royal Excel Mouscron players Category:R.A.E.C. Mons players Category:Willem II (football club) players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Christophe Martin
